thread.title: Where to watch Friday night's Kentucky Big Blue Madness
thread.title_full: Where to watch Friday night's Kentucky Big Blue Madness

title: Where to watch Friday night's Kentucky Big Blue Madness
text:
Where to watch Friday night's Kentucky Big Blue Madness Herald-Leader Staff Report October 16, 2015 Updated 5 hours ago 2015-10-16T16:00:18Z AMY WALLOT — Herald-Leader Buy Photo 
How to follow Friday nights University of Kentucky basketball Big Blue Madness celebration in Rupp Arena: 
Madness is scheduled for 7-9 p.m. 
TELEVISION 
Announcers: Dave O'Brien, along with analysts Sean Farnham and Kara Lawson. 
Where to find SEC Network: 
■ Time Warner Cable: Depending on your individual channel lineup, the SEC Network is at 516/517/518, 79/417/80 or 76/796/77. Those listings are for standard definition, high definition and alternate stations, respectively. 
■ DISH Network: Channel 404 with the Hopper digital box or on channels 408, 596 and 597 depending on equipment. 
■ DirecTV: Channel 611 
PRE-MADNESS SPECIAL 
What: The UK Sports Network is airing a pre-Big Blue Madness special from 5:30 to 7 p.m. 
Hosts: Dave Baker and Christi Thomas 
UK Sports Network stations around Kentucky and the region: 
Lexington: The CW Lexington
